price: Ese umuntu ntiyibuka ko mbere y’ibyo, ari twe twamuremye kandi nta cyo yari cyo?
arabic: أَوَلَا يَذۡكُرُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ أَنَّا خَلَقۡنَٰهُ مِن قَبۡلُ وَلَمۡ يَكُ شَيۡـٔٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: awalā yadhkuru al-insānu annā khalaqnāhu min qablu walam yaku shayan
